Sentencas: A two-part interconnector is developed for solid oxide fuel cell stacks to reduce cost and to improve sealing.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The novel interconnector involves a metallic core for current collection and gas distribution and a ceramic support to house the metallic core and to separate two short stacks.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The new interconnector reduces usage of expensive metallic alloys and substantially reduce mismatch between stack components due to higher expansion coefficient of metals.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The new interconnectors also improve sealing with glass-ceramics eliminating chromium evaporation which is a major reason for sealing failure in fully metallic interconnectors.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A proof of concept short stack is manufactured and tested in this study.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A comparable performance with a convectional interconnector is obtained with new interconnector, while substantially improving the sealing quality.
Titulo: A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells
A novel two-part interconnector for solid oxide fuel cells
